Title: Nigeria @ 65: Indigenous Nigerian Economic Strongholds Since 1960
Summary: Spectranet in Nigeria symbolises possibility, transforming lives, businesses, communities, says Amrish Singhal . The company is located on 36B, Mobolaji Johnson Avenue, Oregun Industrial Estate, Alausa, Lagos .

Title: Agusto rates NEXIM Bbb+ as bank doubles profit to N30b in 2024
Summary: Agusto rates NEXIM Bbb+ as bank doubles profit to N30b in 2024 . The rating signals confidence in its financial stability and operational resilience .

Title: I thought Buhari would end Boko Haram – Jonathan
Summary: Former President Goodluck Jonathan said he expected late President Muhammadu Buhari to end Boko Haram insurgency during his eight-year tenure . Jonathan spoke in Abuja at the public forum .

Title: Jihad means striving to excel, not killing — Sultan of Sokoto
Summary: The Sultan of Sokoto and Chairman of the Northern Traditional Rulers Council, Muhammadu Sa’ad Abubakar III, has stated that Islamism in Nigeria is oriented towards promoting good governance rather than the pursuit of political power . He also refuted widespread beliefs that Jihad means striving to excel, not killing .

Title: Nigeria’s youth face silent threat: High blood pressure must be taken seriously
Summary: Hypertension, commonly called high blood pressure, has long been seen as a problem for older people . But new evidence shows this silent threat is already spreading among Nigeria’s young adults . In Enugu State, a study found that more than a quarter of the country's young adults are suffering from hypertension .

Title: 5 African countries eye historic first World Cup qualification ahead of int’l break
Summary: 5 African countries eye historic first World Cup qualification ahead of int’l break . 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers enter decisive stage . African countries are dreaming big, with history within touching distance .

Title: Statue of Trump, Epstein hand-in-hand reappears near US Capitol
Summary: Statue of Trump, Epstein hand-in-hand reappears near US Capitol . Statue depicting Donald Trump holding hands with Jeffrey Epstein, late financier and sex offender, has reappeared in Washington . Authorities had removed the statue last week .

Title: Obi hails EFCC’s N853 billion crime proceeds recovery
Summary: Obi hails EFCC’s N853 billion crime proceeds recovery . “Nigerians want to see impact. We must be able to trace where and how these recovered funds are invested,’ he said .

Title: Boko Haram now becoming part of Nigerians’ lives – Obasanjo
Summary: Obasanjo made the remarks in Abuja on Friday during the public presentation of "Scars: Nigeria’s Journey and the Boko Haram Conundrum"

Title: I cry almost everyday since I joined Brighton – Super Falcons goalie Nnadozie
Summary: Super Falcons goalkeeper, Chiamaka Nnadozie, has revealed that loneliness has taken a toll on her since joining Brighton & Hove Albion . Super Falcons keeper admits she cries almost everyday since joining English WSL side Brighton .
